hero.title: New course offer from
hero.subtitle:
Digital confidence and

AI competence for

those over 50!

description.paragraph1: Many skilled and experienced employees feel that technology is moving a bit faster than their comfort zone. At the same time, they possess valuable experience that can truly shine — if they get the right digital toolbox.
description.paragraph2: Instead of yet another fruit basket, give the seniors on your team something they’ll actually thank you for: confidence in using AI, smart digital tools, and the feeling of being part of the future — not left behind.

course.title: We offer a practical and motivating course program

duration.title: Duration
duration.text: 1 full day per week over 12 weeks (starting week 47, including 2 weeks Christmas break = 60 hours of instruction)

content.title: Content
content.text: Digital refresher + practical use of AI in everyday work (no tech jargon – just ‘how do I actually do this in practice?’)

format.title: Format for companies
format.text: Dedicated course for up to 8 participants – 45,000 NOK

location.title: Location
location.text: At your workplace, at our facilities, or online (coffee and patience included)

cta.title: Do you have questions?
cta.text: We’re here to help you find the perfect course for your company or yourself.
